channel.title: XKey Updates
channel.description: XKey - Vietnamese Input Method for macOS

item.title: Version 1.2.20 (Build 20260225)
item.description:
What's New

fix: standalone W English detection bug (wngs → ứng) & add missing debug config settings

  • Fix English detection incorrectly flagging standalone W + consonant

patterns (e.g. 'wn') as impossible Vietnamese clusters when

allowConsonantZFWJ is disabled. Now all w-prefixed words pass through

when supportsStandaloneW is true, since w represents ư (valid vowel).

  • Add test: testTelexWNGSToUng verifies w-n-g-s → ứng
  • Add missing settings to debug config log: upperCaseFirstChar,

undoTypingEnabled, beepOnToggle, Translation section, Excluded Apps

Xem chi tiết trên GitHub
